title: Nova Scotia declares state of emergency, identifies 7 more cases of COVID-19 - CTV News
description: Nova Scotia declares state of emergency, identifies 7 more cases of COVID-19 CTV News N.S. declares state of emergency in response to COVID-19 CBC.ca The latest on the coronavirus: Canada refuses to go to Olympics unless postponed; Trudeau not at point of dec…
content: HALIFAX Nova Scotia Premier Stephen McNeil has officially declared a state of emergency in the province due to the COVID pandemic Effective a m Monday the borders of Nova Scotia will be tightened with screening processes at all points of entry chars
